snippet: The Norwegian Nobel Committee awarded the 2013 Peace Prize on Friday to the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, now working to destroy Syria’s stockpile.
abstract: Norwegian Nobel Committee awards 2013 Peace Prize to the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, agency that is working to destroy Syria’s stockpile.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Nick Cumming-Bruce from Geneva; Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon; Andrew Roth from Moscow; Andrew Higgins from Brussels; and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Norwegian Nobel Committee awarded the 2013 Peace Prize on Friday to the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, now working to destroy Syria’s stockpile.

headline.main: Chemical Weapons Watchdog Wins Nobel Peace Prize
headline.print_headline: Chemical Weapons Watchdog Wins Nobel Peace Prize

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
keywords.name: organizations
